    Description
    class 
    DelegatingPostAuthenticationProcessor
    A delegating PostAuthenticationProcessor that invokes process(Saml2UserAuthentication) on all configured processors (in order).
    class 
    SwedenConnectPostAuthenticationProcessor
    A PostAuthenticationProcessor that applies the rules of Sweden Connect, see Technical Specifications for the Swedish eID Framework.
